title: Find Missing Unique Binary String
content: Given an array of unique binary strings, find a binary string of length n that does not exist in the array.
constraints: All the strings of nums are unique.

testCases.description: "11" does not appear in nums. "00" would also be correct.
"11" does not appear in nums. "10" would also be correct.
"101" does not appear in nums. "000", "010", "100", and "110" would also be correct.

inputFormat:
```
The first line contains an integer n, the number of binary strings.
The second line contains n space-separated binary strings, each of length n.
Example:
3
111 011 001
```
outputFormat: Print a single binary string of length n that does not appear in the input array. Any valid such string is accepted.
